As a UX Designer, you will work closely with senior designers, product managers, and developers to create intuitive, engaging, and user-friendly digital experiences. 📍 𝐋𝐨𝐜𝐚𝐭𝐢𝐨𝐧: Johar Town, Lahore (On-site) 𝐊𝐞𝐲 𝐑𝐞𝐬𝐩𝐨𝐧𝐬𝐢𝐛𝐢𝐥𝐢𝐭𝐢𝐞𝐬: 💠Create wireframes, user flows, and prototypes under guidance from senior designers. 💠Translate research insights into clear design solutions. 💠Collaborate with cross-functional teams including product, engineering, and marketing. 💠Contribute to design systems and maintain consistency across platforms. 💠Support accessibility and inclusivity best practices in design. 💠Stay updated with UX trends, tools, and emerging technologies. 𝐑𝐞𝐪𝐮𝐢𝐫𝐞𝐦𝐞𝐧𝐭𝐬: 💠𝟐+ 𝐲𝐞𝐚𝐫𝐬 of experience in UX/UI design or internships in a related role. 💠Basic proficiency with Figma, Adobe XD, Illustrator, Photoshop, or similar tools. 💠Understanding of user-centered design principles. 💠Strong attention to detail and problem-solving mindset. 💠Good communication and collaboration skills. 📌 𝐍𝐨𝐭𝐞: Applicants must attach their portfolios along with their CVs showcasing UX projects. 📩 𝗜𝗻𝘁𝗲𝗿𝗲𝘀𝘁𝗲𝗱 𝗰𝗮𝗻𝗱𝗶𝗱𝗮𝘁𝗲𝘀 𝗮𝗿𝗲 𝗲𝗻𝗰𝗼𝘂𝗿𝗮𝗴𝗲𝗱 𝘁𝗼 𝘀𝘂𝗯𝗺𝗶𝘁 𝘁𝗵𝗲𝗶𝗿 𝗿𝗲𝘀𝘂𝗺𝗲𝘀 𝗮𝘁: careers@cinnova.com

HubSpot Web Developer

Posted: 2025-10-11

Expires: 2025-10-25

Active
Position: HubSpot Web Developer Company: Vidizmo.ai Location: Remote (Pakistan) Type: Full-time About Vidizmo.ai Vidizmo.ai is a fast-growing SaaS and enterprise video platform company focused on AI-driven digital experiences. We’re looking for a HubSpot Web Developer who combines technical expertise, marketing awareness, and a strong sense of ownership. 🎯 Core Responsibilities Design, build, and maintain HubSpot CMS websites, landing pages, and blog templates. Implement HubSpot modules, themes, and dynamic content using HubL, HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. Integrate HubSpot workflows, forms, CTAs, and marketing automation tools. Ensure SEO and performance optimization across all web assets. Collaborate with marketing teams on lead generation campaigns and analytics tracking. Maintain data consistency between HubSpot CRM, website, and other systems (Salesforce, Google Analytics, etc.). Leverage AI tools (ChatGPT, Jasper, Framer AI, etc.) for content, automation, and reporting. ✅ Requirements Bachelor’s degree in Computer Science, Software Engineering, or a closely related field. HubSpot CMS development experience — or certified from HubSpot Academy (CMS Developer or Marketing Software). Strong command of HTML, CSS, JavaScript, HubL, and APIs. Hands-on knowledge of SEO and website performance optimization. Experience integrating third-party tools and CRMs. Excellent English communication and a self-driven, ownership mindset. ⭐ Bonus Skills Experience in WordPress / Webflow or React-based frontends. Familiarity with HubDB, HubSpot API, and custom objects. To Apply: Send your resume + portfolio to sumaira.zaheer@vidizmo.com Subject line: “HubSpot Web Developer”
📍 Remote#HubSpot Web Developer🧳 Experienced Required
